title: Stormborn Half-Elf
entryLore: The Mark of Storm grants power over wind and weather. House Lyrandar carries this mark, dominating the shipping and transportation industries with their ability to control the elements. Half-elves with the Mark of Storm can call lightning, command the winds, and navigate through the fiercest tempests. They are the masters of the airships and elemental galleons that cross Eberron's skies and seas.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have [[advantage]] on saving throws against being [[charmed]], and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Windwright's Intuition
traits.description: When you make a Dexterity ([[acrobatics|Acrobatics]]) check or any ability check involving navigator's tools, you can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the ability check.

traits.name: Headwinds
traits.description: You know the [[gust|Gust]] cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the [[gust_of_wind|Gust of Wind]] spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it when you finish a [[long_rest|Long Rest]]. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

traits.name: Spells of the Mark
traits.description: If you have the Spellcasting or Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Storm Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.
